abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Sao
            Paulo Feeder Roads Project for Brazil is to improve the
            efficiency of the paved municipal road network. Efficiency
            is to be improved as a result of improvements to the
            institutional framework used by the Borrower in four key
            areas to deliver adequate transport conditions to users i.e.
            planning; environmental licensing; participation of private
            sector; and execution, combined with improvements in the
            condition of the paved municipal road network. The
            allocation is necessary for following reasons: (i)
            optimizing the use of the proceeds of the parent loan by
            distributing the unallocated amount between works,
            non-consultant services and consultant services in support
            to the state program of rehabilitation of municipal paved
            roads; and (ii) goods, non-consultant services, training and
            consultant services to support institutional strengthening
            activities mainly to the one of the beneficiary entities,
            the State Secretariat of Transport. There are no outstanding audits.
